response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: _string Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This document provides an overview of the enhancements and new features introduced in the _string standard library module in Python 3.12.
key_points: New functions and methods added in Python 3.12
Example usage of the updated _string module
version_notes: Enhancements and new functions/methods added exclusively in Python 3.12
Backward compatibility for older Python versions
caveats: _string module is not part of the core Python library and may have a different API than built-in string methods.
It's recommended to use it with caution, as its inclusion in the standard library may change between versions.
